# html-javascript
A collection of interesting html and javascript files. Feel free to use it, but please contribute to the repository if you make anything better in any way. For a demo, first try the data URI; then try testAll.html; then try testOffline.html. The first two are dependent on internet for loading the scripts directly from Github so they don't work in all browsers while the third one is depndent on having the scripts pre-downloaded which should be a lot more reliable.
# Data URI that works on iPhones and some browsers
data:text/html;charset=utf-8;base64,
